text: The men's 110 metres hurdles event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 23, 24 and 25 August. 106.7cm (3'6) (senior implement) hurdles were used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Yoel Hernández ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Tomasz Ścigaczewski ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Jovesa Naivalu ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 25 August Wind: +1.8m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
